resources.string: Edit the card information you want to send here

The program only provides the signed card code, not the card sending service. If you need to send cards, please find a trustworthy module yourself. Due to factors that the developer cannot control (such as QQ version updates causing existing cards to be harmonized, the operator of the required service is not stable, large-scale network attacks, risk control and force majeure factors), long-term usability is not guaranteed, do not use for illegal purposes and use discreetly. All development is for testing and learning!

The program only provides the signed card code, not the card sending service. Before using this function, you need to ensure that the content you fill in is compliant and legal. If it violates related provisions, the related account may be suspended. Due to factors that the developer cannot control, long-term usability is not guaranteed, do not use for illegal purposes and use discreetly. All development is for testing and learning!
Listening Data Storage Directory (Leave Root Directory Empty)
Clear All Listening Records on Cloud (Requires 2FA Verification)
It seems I\'m the only one here..( > <.)
There are %s history records in total
I don\'t know anything right now! (> <.), try to **Get** it first!
The program effect can be adjusted according to your actual situation
Pick a satisfactory background from the album..
Here you can set the request interval and shield some notifications

The software may upload your login data to the server for authentication and determining the account owner; but on the server we don\'t intentionally record your login credentials, which usually won\'t pose a threat to your account. By logging in, you agree to this statement

To avoid frequent pulling of API, user information needs to be manually updated, please refresh your account information. If you accidentally log out, you can still restore your login status by refreshing
URL of the Icon Next to the Tag
Some functions need to be restarted to be fully applied
Hiding warnings does not mean you can ignore them, we still reserve the right to terminate related services
Adaptation for full screen, there may be problems at this stage
Remove some cards and custom elements, retain the main functions

Before using the iseen software (hereinafter referred to as "the Software"), please read and understand the following terms carefully:

API Usage: The Software uses third-party APIs, which are only for internal use within the Software and are not related to the authors of the APIs. We are not responsible for any issues or failures with these APIs.
User Responsibility: Users of the Software are responsible for their own actions, including but not limited to data input, output, and operations. The authors of the Software shall not be liable for any direct or indirect losses resulting from the use of the Software.
Intellectual Property: All information and content accessed through this Software are protected by copyright, trademark, and other related laws. Unauthorized copying, distribution, or use may violate legal statutes.
Disclaimer: We strive to ensure the normal operation of the Software, but cannot guarantee that it will always be available or completely error-free. Therefore, you should assume responsibility for any losses incurred due to interruptions, delays, errors, malfunctions, or other issues in the Software.
Privacy Policy: We respect the privacy rights of our users and will not collect, use, or disclose your personal information unless required by law or with your explicit consent.

Please note that this disclaimer may be updated at any time. By using the iseen software, you agree to abide by the above terms and conditions.
